name: ISO/IEC 42001:2023 - Artificial intelligence management system
provider: International Organization for Standardization (ISO) and International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC)
use_case: Specifies requirements for establishing, implementing, maintaining, and continually improving an AI management system (AIMS).
data_summary: Requires policies and controls for data governance, lifecycle management, and documentation supporting the AIMS.
compliance_materials: AI management system manual and policies
Objective and key performance indicator records
Internal audit and management review reports
monitoring: Mandates internal audits, management reviews, and monitoring of AIMS performance.
emergency_plan: Requires incident response, corrective action procedures, and continual improvement plans.
obligations: Define scope, leadership commitment, and roles for the AI management system.
Plan and implement risk-based controls for AI lifecycle processes.
Evaluate performance and drive continual improvement through audits and corrective actions.
